summary: Add __eq__ and __hash__ methods to Todo for comparison
tests_run: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_2730_todo_eq_hash.py

implementation.eq_method: Added __eq__ method comparing id field only with type check

acceptance_criteria_met: Todo objects with same id are considered equal
Todo can be used as dict key or in set
Equality is based on id only (not all fields)
